document.full_text: spain's finance minister said on saturday that the results of stress tests on spanish banks would reassure investors, contrasting with germany which said any failing lenders would get no help from berlin.
document.title: spain says banks healthy while berlin warns its laggards
lines_and_colors: spain's finance minister said on saturday that the results of stress tests on spanish banks would reassure investors, contrasting with germany which said any failing lenders would get no help from berlin.
